app.name: User Info, Links & Modals
app.short_description: Information about the user, quick custom links and modals for admin.
app.long_description:
Displays user information(configurable with custom fields).
Provides access for custom urls to open in links and modals.
Customizable url to different host with custom paramaters.
Multibrand support.
app.installation_instructions:
Install and setup the JSON array of data.
For custom data information see:

json_array.label: JSON Array of data
json_array.helpText:
See  for more information.
There is no JSON validation, so please validate before paste object.
